### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE destinations (
  destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_name VARCHAR(255),
  country VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE destinations SET destination_name = 'Paris' WHERE destination_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE destinations (destination_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  rating FLOAT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP)


CREATE TABLE user_feedback (feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  destination_id UUID,
  rating FLOAT,
  comments TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP)


CREATE TABLE users (user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT NOT NULL,
  email TEXT NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE destinations SET rating = 4.5 WHERE destination_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
